data.text:
I Spit on Your Grave: Deja Vu is an upcoming American horror thriller film written and directed by Meir Zarchi. The cast of the film consists of Camille Keaton, Maria Olsen, and Zarchi.

The film is scheduled to be released on April 23, 2019. It serves as a direct sequel to the 1978 film I Spit on Your Grave.

Plot[]

To be added

Cast[]

Camille Keaton as Jennifer Hills

Maria Olsen as Becky

Meir Zarchi as Priest
